definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
hole/opening/orifice (of the human body)/(fig.) key (to the solution of a problem)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)

sentences.chinese: 有什么窍门可以去眼袋？

sentences.english: The trick is to add that food into your meals in very small amounts.
sentences.chinese: 小窍门就是往你的饭菜中加进少量的此种食物。

sentences.english: Here are tips that might help if you're experiencing homesickness
sentences.chinese: 如果你得了思乡病，这有一些小窍门可能对你有帮助。

sentences.english: Repeat is the doohickey of the memory;
If there was a simple technique or secret I could give you, I would.
sentences.chinese: 如果真有简便易行的技巧或者窍门，我一定会告诉你。

sentences.english: The trick was coming up with zinc fingers for the specific DNA target.
sentences.chinese: 窍门就是特定DNA打靶的锌指结构。

sentences.english: It's important to know that a key aspect of screenwriting is to rewrite.
sentences.chinese: 记住，剧本撰写的窍门之一就是不断地重写。

sentences.english: However, also some tips to make your Pai trip full of wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 不过，也有些小窍门能够让您的牌九之旅充满精彩。

sentences.english: The trick is to put yourself in their shoes and see the world from their perspective.
sentences.chinese: 窍门就是把自己放到他们的鞋子里去看世界。

sentences.english: Yet, some people say that you can never teach an old dog new tricks.
sentences.chinese: 一些人说你从来不教一条老狗新的窍门。

sentences.english: Well, here's one nice little trick.
Nutrition experts offer these simple tips to tame your urges.
sentences.chinese: 营养学家给你一些关于驯服自己渴望的小窍门。

sentences.english: The dimension that buys small doohickey of Chinese style furniture to choose to suit and bold innovation are used.
sentences.chinese: 买中式家具小窍门选择适合的尺寸和大胆的创新使用。

sentences.english: What is the conclusion? I hope you enjoyed my “geeky tips”.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你喜欢我的“技术狂小窍门”。

sentences.english: This trick is mainly about manual gear.
sentences.chinese: 这个窍门主要是关于手动挡车型的。

sentences.english: There are two knacks to note in the Litchi selection.
sentences.chinese: 在挑选荔枝的时候要注意两点小窍门。

definition: smart move/clever way of doing sth
the key trick/the secret of success
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
mistaken ideas/misconceptions/the error of one's ways
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
